sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose if 
\[
	\frac{q + r - p }{b + c - a } = \frac{r + p - q }{c + a - b } = \frac{p + q - r }{a + b - c }
\]
then prove that each ratio is equal to 
\[
	\frac{p }{a } = \frac{q }{b } = \frac{r }{c }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	\frac{q + r - p }{b + c - a } = \frac{r + p - q }{c + a - b } = \frac{p + q - r }{a + b - c }
\]
Each ratio can be given as 
\[
	= \frac{q + r - \input[s1v1]{} + r + p - q + p + q - r }{b + c - a + c + a - b + \input[s1v2]{} + b - c }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{p + \input[s2v1]{} + r }{\input[s2v2]{} + b + c }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, we can write
\[
	\frac{q + r - p }{\input[s3v1]{} + c - a } = \frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q + r - p }{p + q + r } = \frac{\input[s3v2]{} + c - a }{a + b + c }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, by dividendo rule we can write that
\[
	\frac{q + r - p - (p + \input[s4v1]{} + r )}{p + q + r } = \frac{b + c - a - (a + b + \input[s4v2]{})}{a + b + c }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{-2 p }{\input[s5v1]{} + q + r } = \frac{-2a }{a + b + c }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p }{p + q + r } = \frac{\input[s5v2]{}}{a + b + c }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p }{\input[s6v1]{} } = \frac{p + q + r }{\input[s6v2]{} + b + c }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
Similarly we can also prove that
\[
	\frac{q }{\input[s7v1]{} } = \frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }
\]
\[
	\frac{r }{\input[s7v2]{} } = \frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
hence each given ratio is
\[
	=\frac{p }{a } = \frac{q }{b } = \frac{r }{c }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["p", "a"], "text": "$$\text{Since, $\frac{q + r - p }{b + c - a } = \frac{r + p - q }{c + a - b } = \frac{p + q - r }{a + b - c }$, therefore, each ratio is equal to $\frac{\textrm{sum of antecedents}}{\textrm{sum of consequents}}$, which equals $\frac{q + r - p + r + p - q + p + q - r }{b + c - a + c + a - b + a + b - c }$}$$"}, {"data": ["q", "a"], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplification, previous equation can be written as $\frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }$}$$"}, {"data": ["b", "b"], "text": "$$\text{Multiplying $\frac{q + r - p }{b + c - a } = \frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }$ by $\frac{b + c - a}{p + q +r}$, we get $\frac{q + r - p }{p + q + r } = \frac{b + c - a }{a + b + c }$}$$"}, {"data": ["q", "c"], "text": " "}, {"data": ["p", "a"], "text": "$$\text{Further simplification will lead to $\frac{p }{p + q + r } = \frac{a }{a + b + c }$}$$"}, {"data": ["a", "a"], "text": "$$\text{Multiplying both sides by $\frac{p + q +r}{a}$, we get $\frac{p }{a } = \frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }$}$$"}, {"data": ["b", "c"], "text": "$$\text{Beginning with $\frac{r + p - q}{c + a - b}=\frac{p + q +r}{a + b +c}$ and following the previously done steps, we can prove $\frac{q }{b } = \frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }$ and starting from $\frac{p + q - r}{a + b - c}=\frac{p + q +r}{a + b +c}$ and following the same steps, we can prove $\frac{r }{c } = \frac{p + q + r }{a + b + c }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
